tagline.line2: for companies and brands that decide to move forward.

about.line1: I've been developing myself in digital design for 8 years.
about.long_description: I am Kaan Güneş. I am a student of Information Technologies at ITU MTAL. I have been interested in graphic design for over 8 years and I crown this accumulation with professional level works. Apart from my designer identity, I am improving myself in areas such as IoT as a technology enthusiast aiming to contribute to science. In this context, I was entitled to participate in the Erasmus program held in the Netherlands in the autumn of 2025. Also, I have been very interested in the world of Generative AI since the day it first came out and I am developing myself in this direction as an independent field of expertise.
